Posts.Content: Also my sister wondered if anyone else had side effects from the lenograstin injections? She felt she had been run over by a bus! Should she take lots of paracetamol or any other recommendations?
Posts.Title: Lenograstin injection

Posts.Content: My sister has had her first chemo and her hair is starting to fall out. The worst bit is that her scalp is really sore. ANy advice out there would be great !
Posts.Title: Hair loss - sore scalp
